class XGB_Optuna_Objective[source]

XGB_Optuna_Objective(dfl, tmlt, val_preds_metrics, xgb_model, xgb_eval_metric, use_gpu)

Represent XGB Optuna Objective class

Attributes:

xgb_model: type of xgb modmel

xgb_eval_metric: type of xgb eval metric

val_preds_metrics: list of prediction metrics

tmlt: The main tmlt instance
